io.prismic.android

Class Prismic

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.prismic.android.Prismic

  • public class Prismic
extends java.lang.Object
    The main class to instantiate for your project. You should keep a singleton of it in your app. It can be in the Activity if you have only one, or in the Application class otherwise. Make sure to call init() before you use it.

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public void init()
        Initialize the kit and fetch the Api. It is an asynchronous process, so make sure to register a listener to be notified when the Api is ready.

      • getBookmarks

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getBookmarks()

      • getBookmark

      • getDocument

        public void getDocument(java.lang.String id,
               Prismic.Listener<io.prismic.Document> listener)

      • registerListener

        public void registerListener(Prismic.Listener<io.prismic.Api> listener)
        Register a listener to be notified when the Api is ready. If the Api is already ready when this method is called, the callback will be called immediately.
